title: Meet Amanda Ross, the Duchess of Cambridge's new favourite designer
text:
When the Duchess of Cambridge buys a special dress, we imagine there’s a bit of a process. There might be a conversation with a stylist or an assistant, a few tweaks to make the garment more modest in adherence with royal protocol, maybe even a fitting or two.

But it appears even Kate indulges in a spot of online shopping from time to time - at least that would explain the shock experienced by US fashion editor-turned-designer Amanda Ross when she woke up last Wednesday morning to discover that Kate had stepped out in one of her dresses on the other side of the Atlantic.
description: When the Duchess of Cambridge buys a special dress, we imagine there’s a bit of a process.
